channel.title: [5O8] how do i spawn a hell cat?
channel.description:
i have summoning pets in my server but i want to spanw a hell cat how i do this?
grtz, KoF

item.title: [5O8] how do i spawn a hell cat?
item.dc:creator: @KoF KoF
item.description:
@KoF wrote:

the dragon is a pet not a pouch to summon a monster…

i need to drop te dragon before he spawn

its what i want but only with a cat
how?

EDIT:

dropitem.java

if(itemId == 1555) { if(p.FamiliarID == 0) { if(p.skillLvl[22] != 99) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need 99 construction to drop this pet."); } else { p.requestAnim(827, 0); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You drop your kitten on the ground."); p.frames.setTab(p, 80, 663); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 663, 3); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 761, 663, 3); Engine.newSummonNPC(761, p.absX, p.absY+1, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false, p.playerId); p.FamiliarType = 761; Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, itemId, itemSlot,p.itemsN[itemSlot]); } } }

login.java

if(p.FamiliarType == 761) { p.frames.setTab(p, 80, 663); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 663, 3); p.frames.setNPCId(p, 761, 663, 3); Engine.newSummonNPC(761, p.absX, p.absY+1, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1, p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false, p.playerId); }

but i cant pickup my kitten :s how i fix this?

Read full topic
item.source: [5O8] how do i spawn a hell cat?

item.title: [5O8] how do i spawn a hell cat?
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

[quote=“KoF, post:9, topic:264065”]can i copy the code of a summoning pet like a black dragon and change id?

can any post a gd code?[/quote]

It’s completely different from summoning. Summoning is where u use items to create monsters.

When you have a pet u either buy it or add it to you inventory. Then you drop it and it turns into a NPC. (Easiest way to put it)

You can’t just copy and paste one code and hope it works. Its going to take someone that knows what they are doing. Which obviously seems to not be you, maybe have a friend do it for you?

Read full topic
